meaningMnemonic: We're talking about both a <kanji>rice paddy</kanji> and the other <kanji>field</kanji>s where farmers grow crops. So, this means <vocabulary>fields</vocabulary>, or more precisely <vocabulary>rice and crop fields</vocabulary>. It's all about <vocabulary>farmland</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings come from what you learned with the kanji. 畑 uses the shorter はた reading that you learned.
